Package OpenHouse.AI.CodingExerciseNGG

Class CodingExerciseNggApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • OpenHouse.AI.CodingExerciseNGG.CodingExerciseNggApplication
  • @SpringBootApplication
@RestController
public class CodingExerciseNggApplication
extends java.lang.Object

    CodingExerciseNggApplication

    This program is created as port of the application process for a Backend Software Developer position. Main objective is to receive log entries and store them into memory while having the capability to retrieve them. Functionalities include consuming POST requests and parsing them into memory and GET requests to scan memory and return results
    Since:
    2022-06-10

      • main

        public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)

      • getLogs

        @RequestMapping(value="/logs/get",
                method=GET,
                produces="application/json")
public java.lang.String getLogs​(@RequestParam(value="userId",required=false)
                                java.lang.String userId,
                                @RequestParam(value="type",required=false)
                                java.lang.String type,
                                @RequestParam(value="from",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME)
                                java.time.LocalDateTime fromDatetime,
                                @RequestParam(value="to",required=false) @DateTimeFormat(iso=DATE_TIME)
                                java.time.LocalDateTime toDatetime)
                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This method is used to search the memory for logs and return anything that fit the criteria.
        Parameters:
        userId - A user's ID in which will be checked if any logs matches
        type - The type of interaction taken by the user and will be checked if any logs matches
        fromDatetime - The starting date that will checked if any logs are logged after this date
        toDatetime - The ending date that will checked if any logs are logged before this date
        Returns:
        String the response of the get action.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

        This method is used to add one log into the logging system.

        Returns:

      • buildSimpleResponse

        private java.lang.String buildSimpleResponse​(boolean success,
                                             java.lang.String message)
        This is a helper method, used to construct a quick response message to be sent back to the user.
        Parameters:
        success - Will show to the user if the action succeeded
        message - A custom message so the system can display any message to the user
        Returns:
        String the constructed JSON response to be passed back to the user.
